changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE transactions ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(), from_wallet_id UUID NOT NULL, to_wallet_id UUID NOT NULL, user_id UUID NOT NULL, amount NUMERIC(19, 2), currency currency NOT NULL, transaction_type transaction_type NOT NULL, status transaction_state NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );
